From time to time you need to exchange information with people who do not have access to Polarion. MS Word round-trip is an easy and straight forward way to collaborate with the "outside office world".
  • Export E-Library_2011_spec document using Gear icon | Word Round-trip |Export Document. Use Review Option.
  • Add some comments in the document you've exported. Save the document as "E-Library_reviewed"
  • Upload the changed document using Gear icon | Word Round-trip | Import Changes
  • Use the document comment pane to review the imported comments

  • Use document history to identify the changes in the document by comparing the actual revision and the revision when the document was exported.
MS Word round-trip and offline work
